item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, May 23, 2025 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump ‘not looking for a deal’ as he threatens EU with 50% tariff
2. Trump administration bars Harvard from enrolling international students
3. Trump threatens Apple and Samsung with 25% tariff on devices
4. Investors shift away from US bond market on fears over Trump policies
5. [Opinion] Generative AI models are skilled in the art of bullshit
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, May 23, 2025 at 8:20 PM UTC
